Nina Foxx bụ onye edemede America, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, soro dee otu ederede na ederede, a kọwakwara ọrụ ya ọtụtụ ugboro
O dekwara ihe nkiri abụọ nke gụnyere egwu mbụ ya na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ John Forbes
Foxx na-ede n'okpuru ọtụtụ aha gụnyere: Nina Foxx na Cynnamon Foster
Foxx sitere na Queens, New York
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hunter College (BA Psychology), Baruch College (MS, I/O, Psychology), City University of New York (Ph.D
I/O Psychology) ma nwee MFA na Creative Writing (akụkọ ifo) na Mahadum Farleigh Dickinson.
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye edemede, Foxx rụrụ ọrụ na Dell. O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ikike mmepụta ihe ma kụzie Applied Psychology na ọtụtụ mahadum
Foxx na-ekwu maka ndụ ederede na ịgwakọta nka na teknụzụ na otu na ụlọ akwụkwọ niile na United States dị ka akụkụ nke mbọ STEM dị iche iche na otu ndị dị ka The Links, Inc na code.org
N'afọ 2019, Foxx, ya na di ya, guzobere The Writing Sisters Summit writer's retreat
Foxx bụ onye otu Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority, The Links, Inc., The Girl Friends, Inc, na Jack na Jill nke America.
Foxx so duzie Marrying Up, nke dabeere n'akwụkwọ ya nke otu aha ahụ
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ihe nkiri a, Foxx bụ onye isi mmepụta nke ihe nkiri Magic Valley', nke bụ nhọrọ gọọmentị nke 2011 TriBeCa Film Festival.
A họpụtara Foxx maka onyinye na Outstanding Literary Work in Fiction site na NAACP Image Awards na 2014.
